content: LIVE MATCH AND SPORTS STREAM API SYSTEMS https://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-01.jpghttps://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-02.jpghttps://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-03.jpghttps://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-04.jpghttps://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-05.jpghttps://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-06.jpghttps://www.linkpicture.com/q/anonsports-eng-1.0-07.jpgHELLO,-Would you like to examine our APIs, which are affordable and specially prepared for you, in detail?-Try our live sports and match broadcast APIs, which are compatible with all betting systems and integrated into matches in your site content!-+21 Uninterrupted broadcasting in sports!-24/7 Premium channels-Custom Channel Options-Uninterrupted service..-Our API Solutions provide our Customers with everything they need for fast market entry.-Unlike other companies, we set special prices for your traffic and you do not pay for the traffic you do not use, you will not encounter additional fees.-It was created by combining the data of 4 different APIs and premium publications.-Our broadcasts exit and reach you from the dedicated AWS-HETZNR-OVH servers. -We provide pricing according to your traffic hit, you do not pay for the traffic you do not receive.-It will make us happy that you are included in our portfolio, which consists of well-established companies and has been in the sector for a long time.-Don't miss the pre-season promotions!For detailed information, visit our website and contact us.7/24 LIVE SUPPORTSKYPE:live:.cid.cf5e7899d87f8341Telegram:t.me/anonsports_official

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.body: Quote from: peteycamey on July 27, 2022, 11:34:03 PMthat looks nice.thank you

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.body: be informed about the campaigns immediately !

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Do I need to have my own site to be able to use the streaming service? If I like the way the stream are running, could you just supply me with the streams?What can you tell us about the delay compared to the live event played on the venue and the stability of the streams?

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on July 30, 2022, 07:53:27 AMDo I need to have my own site to be able to use the streaming service? If I like the way the stream are running, could you just supply me with the streams?What can you tell us about the delay compared to the live event played on the venue and the stability of the streams?--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"Do I need to have my own site to be able to use the streaming service?"*Option 1 - You direct the domain to us and everything is done by our technical team.*Option 2 - If you have your own site, you can publish all the content on your own site with our API service.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"If I like the way the stream are running, could you just supply me with the streams?"*yes we can make streams available to you----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------"What can you tell us about the delay compared to the live event played on the venue and the stability of the streams?"*we have source streams and you get streams with lowest latency*systems are installed according to audience capacity and freezing is almost never experienced----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

comments.author: peteycamey
comments.body: I vouch for this guy. I know him irl, he is 100% legit and reliable.

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.body: Quote from: peteycamey on July 30, 2022, 12:08:49 PMI vouch for this guy. I know him irl, he is 100% legit and reliable.thank you, i am proud to work with you

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Would it be possible to test the quality of the streaming service on a match of my choice? For example, I tell you the league and the match, and you give me a link to the fastest (in terms of delay) stream you have for it? That way I can compare your service with my own sources and the channels I have on my disposal.

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on July 30, 2022, 12:36:40 PMWould it be possible to test the quality of the streaming service on a match of my choice? For example, I tell you the league and the match, and you give me a link to the fastest (in terms of delay) stream you have for it? That way I can compare your service with my own sources and the channels I have on my disposal. On our demo and reference sites, there are streaming of the matches of all leagues, you can choose and compare the match whenever you want. We can integrate the channels you want externally into the system.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: ANONSPORTS on July 30, 2022, 12:51:36 PMOn our demo and reference sites, there are streaming of the matches of all leagues, you can choose and compare the match whenever you want. I took a look at a couple of football and basketball matches that were streamed last night on your demo sites. Unfortunately, I wasn't satisfied with what I saw. I am not talking about the quality of the picture here, but my focus was only on the delay from live events. According to my tests, it was over 30 seconds for some matches, which makes the service unsuitable for my needs. Even my IPTV was faster at times.  Do you have any faster streams or do you know some particular leagues/sports where the service might be faster?

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.created_time: July 31, 2022, 10:26:27 AMLast edit: July 31, 2022, 10:43:08 AM by ANONSPORTS
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on July 31, 2022, 08:53:44 AMQuote from: ANONSPORTS on July 30, 2022, 12:51:36 PMOn our demo and reference sites, there are streaming of the matches of all leagues, you can choose and compare the match whenever you want. I took a look at a couple of football and basketball matches that were streamed last night on your demo sites. Unfortunately, I wasn't satisfied with what I saw. I am not talking about the quality of the picture here, but my focus was only on the delay from live events. According to my tests, it was over 30 seconds for some matches, which makes the service unsuitable for my needs. Even my IPTV was faster at times.  Do you have any faster streams or do you know some particular leagues/sports where the service might be faster?sorry, 10-30 second latency is an excellent rate for tv systems, and it's impossible to go below.This loss occurs when the streams are broadcast again after they are stream on TV.delay for premium channels is mandatory and on the web 10-30 seconds delay is considered excellent.We serve in 21+ categories in total and the lag is almost zero as the posts in our other categories are web content.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: ANONSPORTS on July 31, 2022, 10:26:27 AMsorry, 10-30 second latency is an excellent rate for tv systems, and it's impossible to go below. It depends on the service provider, but it's possible to get a much smaller delay.Quote from: ANONSPORTS on July 31, 2022, 10:26:27 AMThis loss occurs when the streams are broadcast again after they are stream on TV. That's correct and that's the problem. Deep down I didn't expect it to be any different, but I did want to check it out just to see if by any chance they are pre-production streams (not sure what the official term is). From time to time, I have access to those and they are faster than cable or satellite transmission. I can't name any names though.

comments.author: ANONSPORTS
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on July 31, 2022, 01:01:06 PMQuote from: ANONSPORTS on July 31, 2022, 10:26:27 AMsorry, 10-30 second latency is an excellent rate for tv systems, and it's impossible to go below. It depends on the service provider, but it's possible to get a much smaller delay.Quote from: ANONSPORTS on July 31, 2022, 10:26:27 AMThis loss occurs when the streams are broadcast again after they are stream on TV. That's correct and that's the problem. Deep down I didn't expect it to be any different, but I did want to check it out just to see if by any chance they are pre-production streams (not sure what the official term is). From time to time, I have access to those and they are faster than cable or satellite transmission. I can't name any names though. We do not have such a broadcast, I was excited to hear that there is such a thing. I really hope we can reach that technology together.for now we are doing a world-class business and it was not possible to see better, if you come across, please show us.I'm so glad to meet you and have a chance to chat, my friend.

comments.body: we continue with our new references ++
